name: BetterAffinity
description: A selection of minor aestetical tweaks to make the beta version of Furaffinity bearable again.
additional_info:
(Please note this style is a work in progress.)

Changes include:
- A more appealing, dark theme!
- Obnoxious artwork banner removed
- Rounded Avatars
- Thinner navbars and info boxes.

Version History

1.0:
-- Inital release

1.1:
FA changed a lot of stuff for their beta layout. So this is getting rewritten with more comments in the code.

Colour scheme:

- Made changes to the colours to make it easier to read in lower-lighting
- Removed sidebar gradient.

Navbar:

- Made the navbar 5px slimmer
- Made the navbar text smaller in order to fit the new navbar size.
- Resized search and logo slightly.
- Removed user avatar from navbar.
- Navbar is now sticky. Making searching for art 20% faster!
